PCY-GRP-OE1-PROD-PLATFORM-OCVS-ADMIN-KEY.name: pcy-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admins
statements: allow group grp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admin-group to manage sddcs in compartment cmp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs
allow group grp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admin-group to manage instances in compartment cmp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs
allow group grp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admin-group to manage vcns in compartment cmp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs
allow group grp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admin-group to use subnets in compartment cmp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs
allow group grp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admin-group to use vnics in compartment cmp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs
allow group grp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admin-group to use vlans in compartment cmp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs
allow group grp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admin-group to use private-ips in compartment cmp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs
allow group grp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admin-group to inspect security-lists in compartment cmp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs
allow group grp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs-admin-group to use network-security-groups in compartment cmp-p-oe1-p-platform-ocvs
